page.title: 10Moy Child's Day
page.content:
I woke at 7.00a.m. and went downstairs to have a wash. I dressed myself and had cornflakes for breakfast. I read my comics until Aunty took my two friends and me swimming. The lady at the pool wouldn't let us in so we went into Woolworth's, bought some Hubba Bubba and went home.
The hobbies of Moy School children are swimming, playing, roller skating, collecting posters, computer, cycling, drawing, horse riding, records, stamp collecting, collecting models and reading. The most popular hobby is swimming. We also watch a lot of programmes on television.
